# Anton Solovyov - Personal Website

> Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer specializing in React, TypeScript, Node.js, Go, and Web3.

This is the personal portfolio website of Anton Solovyov, a software engineer with extensive experience building scalable solutions for Web2 and Web3 applications serving millions of users.

## Quick Facts

- Name: Anton Solovyov
- Role: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
- Current Employer: Tea.xyz (Open-Source Software startup)
- Location: Remote
- Email: antonsolovyov@gmail.com
- Years of Experience: 13+ years (since 2011)

## Core Competencies

- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Angular, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Go, Java, Scala, Python
- Web3: Solidity, ethers.js, ERC-4337, Smart Contracts, EVM L2
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle DB, MySQL
- Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel, Firebase
- DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD

## Machine-Readable Resources

- Resume (JSON-LD): https://antonsolovyov.com/resume.json
- PDF Resume: https://antonsolovyov.com/Resume_Anton_Solovyov.pdf
- Sitemap: https://antonsolovyov.com/sitemap.xml
- Check Fit page: https://antonsolovyov.com/check-fit

## API Endpoints

### Check Fit API
Endpoint: POST https://antonsolovyov.com/api/check-fit
Purpose: Analyze how well a job description matches Anton's qualifications.
Request Body: { "jobDescription": "string" }
Response: { "success": boolean, "analysis": { "matchScore": number, "summary": string, "strengths": string[], "gaps": string[] } }
